# Setup
```{r}
library(yspec)
```


# Load some examples


## An example data specification
```{r}
spec <- load_spec_ex()
head(spec)
```


## An example project file
```{r}
spec <- load_proj_ex()
spec
```


## An example lookup file
```{r}
spec <- load_spec_ex("lookup.yml")
head(spec)
```


# Work with a `yspec` object

```{r}
spec <- load_spec_ex()

names(spec)

spec$WT
```
